item.description:
anyone enjoy kayaking? i've enjoyed kayaking in the area very much. If we could find a place to rent for those who dont have access to them would be a good thing for any size group.

I've added a date, time and place for the meetup :)

We'll gather in the parking lot at the boat launch. You'll need to bring your own kayak or other boat, of course. Apparently the Mansfield Community Center and  http://www.facebook.com/pages/Five-Mile-Outfitters/118797561493771 Rent kayaks for the day.

Bring bug spray, sunblock, snacks and water :)

Not raining here, just a bit overcast -- we're still on :)

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Kayaking
